code: @Override public void message(String component, String message) {     getLogger(component).trace("{} {}: {}", Thread.currentThread().getName(), component, message). }
@Override public boolean isEnabled(String component) {     // to log it:     return getLogger(component).isTraceEnabled() && component.equals("TP") == false. }
private Logger getLogger(String component) {     return loggers.computeIfAbsent(component, c -> Loggers.getLogger(parentLogger, "." + c)). }
